Package de.oth.blocklib.world.chunks.meshing

Class BlockMesh

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.world.chunks.meshing.BlockMesh
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderable
public class BlockMesh
extends java.lang.Object
implements Renderable
Create a mesh out of an array. CAREFUL! If something is changed in the array, call isMeshLatest(false) or it wont be updated
Author:
Tobias Zink, edit: Tobias Mueller, Stefan Hofweber (WiSe 2018/19), Tobias Werner
See Also:
Chunk

      private boolean isMeshLatest

  • Constructor Details

    • BlockMesh

      public BlockMesh​(BlockStorage blockStorage, Vector3i globalPosition)
      creates a new Meshbuilder, that is used for creating a mesh out of an BlockType array
      Parameters:
      blockStorage - this data structure contains all data that is needed to generate the mesh
      globalPosition - the position where the mesh should be placed by default
